summary: A comprehensive integration test suite for the Wav2Vec2 speech model that loads various datasets, runs inference, and checks training loss across multiple speech processing tasks such as transcription, diarization, emotion detection, intent classification, keyword spotting, speaker identification/verification, phoneme recognition, and language model integration.
business_intent: Ensure the Wav2Vec2 model meets production quality standards by validating its accuracy, robustness, and compatibility across diverse speech AI applications before deployment.
